wikipedia_page.main: Franklyn Hinds (born 8 May 1967) is a Cayman Islands cricketer. A right-handed batsman and right-arm medium pace bowler, he has played for the Cayman Islands national cricket team since 2000.

link_mentions.page: 2007 ICC World Cricket League Division Three

response: *Franklyn Hinds (born 1967), cricketer from the Cayman Islands
